name: Scrollbar:  Black Twisty Worm Gear
description: CSS scrollbar for firefox (browser-chrome).  Pure CSS; No images.
additional_info:
Scrollbar: Black Twisty Worm Gear ver 1.0 browser compatibility: firefox only. target: firefox browser-chrome (xul namespace). css notes:
  • The 'rotating' gear effect is only available in xul documents (ie, browser-chrome). Setting "background-attachment: fixed;" seems to break background-image rule on scrollbar elements when they are located on html webpages. Quick and dirty hack is used to disable this effect on webpages/html-docs. Appears to be a firefox bug.
